Note: Together with 5550 and 387 which also paraphrase lines of Ecclesiasticus iii.32.
_description: Paraphrase of Ecclesiasticus iii. 32, in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook — a couplet

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þe wise herte & understondinggeal kepen him selue fro
                    senningge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 3.
